item.title: How to manager macOS App in a well way
item.description: I am a Linux user before using macOS.In Linux, We can using the package manager install the all Apps. But in macOS, it not. So, how can I use one command to upgrade all App and command line tools like Linux? So, I find a good Homebrew Plugin.
